title: New: Jungle Fires – Hold
body:
Brooklyn’s **Jungle Fires** (Kaia and Menashé David Israel) ooze cool.

Their debut track (although there appears to have been some form of reinvention along the way), _Hold_, manages to be soulful and sensual, whilst remaining on the right side of slick pop music – we’re talking big choruses and a booming vocal line. Check out Hold below.
